title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Lot 1: 2019 Moonbits 5k bits BTC chip, alloy/titan finishLOT 2: 2019 Moonbits 1k bits BTC chip, alloy/brass finishLOT 3: 2019 Moonbits 1M bits Bitcore chip, alloy/titan finishLOT 4: 2x 2018 Moonbits 1k bits BTC chip, alloy/silver finishLOT 5: 3x 2016 Satori pre-fork chips, plastic/orangeLOT 6: 3x 2017 Satori post-fork chips, plastic/orange**Will add chip numbers/addresses soon****LOT 4, LOT 5, and LOT 6 will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous auctions. You are bidding on the number of chips first and then the amount per chip you are bidding: 1 @ xx btc, 2 @ xx btc, etc **STARTING BID LOT 1: 0.0050BTCSTARTING BID PER CHIP ALL OTHER LOTS: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER CHIP PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: OCTOBER 1st, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
